Customized Shopify Templates

2021/eCommerce Strategy, Shopify Liquid, Ruby

Role:
UX/UI + Front End Developer

Date:
2020 - 2021

Overview

  • Implemented calculator script that shows “You are $__ away from free shipping” + Continue Shopping link. This feature increased average order value by 15%.
  • Advocated for and ultimately implemented language cautioning customers about shipping delays, and deterring the use of P.O. box addresses during the height of eCommerce season. This feature reduced customer complaints by close to 20%, and saved an average of $1,400 in shipping costs.
  • Implemented “Gift Messaging” text input area for customers sending orders as gifts for the holidays.
  • Collaborated with 3rd party developers to implement “Similar Products” in cart promoting upsells and increasing average order value.

Data Analytics Reporting & Visualization

2021/ Google Analytics, PowerPoint

Role:
Data Analyst, Technical Lead

Date:
2019 - 2021

Overview

  • Evaluated growth and potential opportunities for our eCommerce business using data from Google Analytics.
  • Developed presentations for C-level stakeholders to communicate the current and potential future state of business, identifying key consumer touchpoints, what the business is succeeding at, and areas of opportunity to grow.
  • Created graphs, charts, and made unbiased interpretations illustrating the websites’ analytics reporting in a way that it could easily inform successful data-driven business decisions.

eCommerce Website Redesign

2019 / Project Management, UX/UI

Role:
Project Manager

Date:
2018 - 2019

Overview

  • Created RFP for redesign and relaunch of the website, with the goal of UX/UI designed to increase conversions. Direct-to-Consumer sales, newsletter signups, User-Generated Content
  • Iterated through user journeys and consumer touchpoints, created wireframes and visual representations for mobile, tablet, desktop.
  • Developed information architecture to emphasize eCommerce focus.
  • Worked closely with developers on iterations and code implementation.
  • Implemented Basecamp as a documentation and project management tool.
  • Coordinated between developers and C-level stakeholders to ensure project deliverables met expectations.

Some aspects of these website images have been replaced in compliance with non-disclosure agreements.
